title: Maud Martha - the landmarks that Papa passes

content.prompt: In the sixteenth paragraph, the landmarks that Papa passes on his walk home are carefully noted primarily in order to

choices.label: provide background atmosphere for the familyâ€™s more elevated social position
suggest that the family is much like the other families in the neighborhood
foreshadow the weight of the news Papa is carrying home to them
emphasize the high degree of suspense and tension the three women feel

skill.text: Skill 3.E: Explain the function of a significant event or related set of significant events in a plot.
